game.name: Ellie Gingerbread House Decoration
game.description:
Christmas has just reached and the most popular princess Ellie has a unique plan to make this celebration big and memorable. She wants to decorate the tree and prepares some extremely delicious gingerbread, which is her favourite sweet treats. Hope you will have the best Christmas this year with this beautiful girl. Help the girl to find out the tasty ingredients to cook the best gingerbread house. Play Ellie Gingerbread House Decoration and get a chance to learn a new and widely popular recipe today!

Completing do-it-yourself projects timely is her speciality. Hope she will also get the success once again when you join her on the wonderful occasion of Christmas. Start this brand new cooking game for girls with mixing all the ingredients like ginger, sugar, butter and flour first. Then cut the dough in triangle or square shapes using special cookie cutters. Ellie knows how to bake them. Meanwhile, you can begin building the house by collecting all the needful pieces together.

Also use the cream between the pieces to help them stick with each other. Decorate the house with the help of different coloured cream by coloring the small elements on the walls, the windows, the door and the rooftop. There you will also find out candy canes, a colourful candy that is available in different shapes and several other gingerbread decoration accessories. Follow the instructions and indications step-by-step in order to create a huge score in this brand new cooking game for girls and boys. Have a wonderful time playing this fun kitchen game!
